Michael McAndrew.title: Detector Engineer, Inscribe AI
Michael McAndrew.description: Most recently a Detector Engineer at Inscribe. A big fan of detecting things with computers. Previously interned at Salesforce and worked on Trinity Live, a new API for students and staff in Trinity College Dublin.

Kevin McAndrew.title: Electronic and Computer Engineering Student, University of Limerick
Kevin McAndrew.description: Previously a co-op student with Analog Devices and currently an intern for Provizio. Also very fond of side projects to do with cars, bike, motorbikes, robotics and plenty more.
